item.title: 跨窗口通信
item.description: 实现方式 同源限制 Cookie Webstorage - localStorage BroadcastChannel window.open 不同源的窗口内通信 父窗口： <h1>发送端</h1> <p>键入发送的消息：</p> <form name="sender" onsubmit="return sendMessage();"> <input type="text" name="message" size="30" value=""> <input type="submit" value="发送"> <input type="reset" value="清空"> </form> <iframe src="http://192.168.5.125:9001/cross-window-connection/postMessage-receiver.html" name="msg2"></iframe>let win = window.frames.msg2; function updateMessage() { return document.forms['sender'].elements['message'].value; } function sendMessage() { win.postMessage(updateMessage(), "*"); return false; } iframe 中子窗口： <h1>接受端</h1> <p>接收到的消息：</p> <form name="receiver"> <input type="text" name="message" size="30" value="" readonly disabled> </form>window.addEventListener("message", function (event) { document.forms["receiver"].elements['message'].value = event.
